item.title: By: Jesus

item.description: I vaped this flavor during a head cold. The mint flavor was great on the sore throat. Great Taste!
item.content:encoded: I vaped this flavor during a head cold. The mint flavor was great on the sore throat. Great Taste!

item.title: By: Robb marshall
item.dc:creator: Robb marshall
item.description: This flavor is absolutely amazing. Taste is as advertised and clouds for days!
item.content:encoded: This flavor is absolutely amazing. Taste is as advertised and clouds for days!
